meanings.definition: Aligners: a person or thing that aligns
meanings.sent1: The aligners in the factory ensure all the products are perfectly straight.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker used the aligners to make sure the walls were level.
meanings.sent3: The aligners at the bowling alley always keep the pins in a neat row.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted as aligners, bringing harmony to the chaotic situation.
meanings.sent5: The aligners on the shelf neatly arranged the books by size.

meanings.definition: Aligners: a type of orthodontic device used to straighten teeth
meanings.sent1: She wore her aligners every night to fix her crooked teeth.
meanings.sent2: The orthodontist recommended aligners to correct the alignment of his teeth.
meanings.sent3: The aligners made her smile look like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: His confidence grew as the aligners worked their magic on his teeth.
meanings.sent5: The aligners gently nudged her teeth into a perfect line over time.
